attributes.action: Implement the recommendations of the Police Remuneration Review Body  in full.
attributes.additional_details: Because government has a history of cutting the pay rise recommended by the Police Remuneration Review Body (PRRB)
attributes.background: The Police Remuneration Review Body (PRRB) is independent and HMG should accept and implement its findings in full and without staging.

rejection.details:
The Government has already accepted the recommendations made by the Police Remuneration Review Body in its eight report: https://questions-statements.parliament.uk/written-statements/detail/2022-07-19/hcws238

We could accept a petition calling on the Government to make it so that in future the recommendations of the Police Remuneration Review Body are automatically implemented, rather than needing to be accepted by the Government, if that's what you want to happen.
